Walter Townsend

  1. Foster Name: Walter Lincoln
  2. Foster Family: Carl and Ellen Becker
  3. Location of Family: Holdrege, NE

  8. Date of Death: 3/30/1991, OR
  9. Gender: male
  10. Spouse Name: La Verna Tumbleson
